types.name: ActionId
types.description: An action mapped uniquely to an ID.

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The `Boolean` scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

types.name: Config
types.description: Configuration for this instance of SpriteCollab.

fields.name: actionMap
fields.description: A mapping of actions to EoS action indices.

fields.name: actions
fields.description: A list of known action. The position is the ID of the action.

fields.name: completionActions
fields.description:
Returns a list, that for each phase contains a list of actions (by index) that
need to exist for this phase to be considered completed.

fields.name: completionEmotions
fields.description:
Returns a list, that for each phase contains a list of emotions (by index)
that need to exist for this phase to be considered completed.

fields.name: emotions
fields.description: A list of known emotions. The position is the ID of the emotion.

fields.name: portraitSize
fields.description: The portrait width and height in pixels.

fields.name: portraitTileX
fields.description: How many portraits per row a portrait sheet contains.

fields.name: portraitTileY
fields.description: How many rows a portrait sheet contains.

types.name: CopyOf
types.description: A sprite, which is a copy of another sprite.

fields.name: action
fields.description: Action of this sprite.

fields.name: copyOf
fields.description: Which action this sprite is a copy of.

fields.name: locked
fields.description: Whether or not this sprite is locked and requires special permissions to be updated.

fields.name: contact
fields.description: Contact information for this author.

fields.name: discordHandle
fields.description:
Discord name and discriminator in the form Name#Discriminator (eg.
Capypara#7887), if this is a credit for a Discord profile, and the server can
resolve the ID to a Discord profile.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Discord ID or absentee ID. Guaranteed to be an ASCII string.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The human-readable name of the author. Guaranteed to be an ASCII string.

types.name: DateTimeUtc
types.description: DateTime

types.name: Int
types.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

fields.name: apiVersion
fields.description: Version of this API.

fields.name: assetsCommit
fields.description: Git Commit (https://github.com/PMDCollab/SpriteCollab/) currently checked out to serve the assets.

fields.name: assetsUpdateDate
fields.description:
Date of the last commit in the assets repository
(https://github.com/PMDCollab/SpriteCollab) that is currently checked out.

fields.name: serverVersion
fields.description: Version of spritecollab-srv serving this API.

fields.name: updateCheckedDate
fields.description: Date that the server last checked for updates.

fields.name: forms
fields.description: All forms that exist for this monster.

fields.name: get
fields.description: Get a specific form for this monster.

fields.name: id
fields.description: ID of this monster.

fields.name: manual
fields.description:
Manually enter the path to a monster, seperated by /. This should match the
path as it is stored in SpriteCollab, however the path passed in might be
collapsed until a unique form is found.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Human-readable name of this monster.

fields.name: rawId
fields.description: Raw ID of this monster, as a string. This is a 4-character numeric string, padded with leading zeroes.

types.name: MonsterBounty
types.description:
A SkyTemple Discord Server Guild Point bounty that will be rewarded, if the
portrait or sprite has transitioned into a phase.

fields.name: exists
fields.description: Amount of points to reward if the phase changes to Exists.

fields.name: full
fields.description: Amount of points to reward if the phase changes to Full.

fields.name: incomplete
fields.description: Amount of points to reward if the phase changes to Incomplete.

fields.name: modreward
fields.description: If true, SpriteBot will not automatically hand out the Guild Point bounty.

fields.name: canon
fields.description: Whether or not this form is canon.

fields.name: fullName
fields.description: Human-readable full name of this form (excluding the monster name itself).

fields.name: fullPath
fields.description:
The path to this form (including the monster ID) as it's specified in the
SpriteCollab tracker.json file and repository file structure.

fields.name: isFemale
fields.description: Whether or not this form is considered for a female monsters.

fields.name: isShiny
fields.description: Whether or not this form is considered for a shiny.

fields.name: monsterId
fields.description: The ID of the monster, that this form belongs to.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Human-readable name of this form.

fields.name: path
fields.description:
The path to this form (without the monster ID) as it's specified in the
SpriteCollab tracker.json file and repository file structure.

fields.name: portraits
fields.description: Portraits for this form.

fields.name: sprites
fields.description: Sprites for this form.

fields.name: bounty
fields.description: Guild Point bounty for this portrait set.

fields.name: creditPrimary
fields.description: Primary artist credits.

fields.name: creditSecondary
fields.description: All other artists credited.

fields.name: emotion
fields.description: A single portrait for a given emotion.

fields.name: emotionFlipped
fields.description: A single flipped portrait for a given emotion.

fields.name: emotions
fields.description: A list of all existing portraits for the emotions.

fields.name: emotionsFlipped
fields.description: A list of all existing flipped portraits for the emotions.

fields.name: modifiedDate
fields.description: The date and time this portrait set was last updated.

fields.name: phase
fields.description: Current completion phase of the portraits.

fields.name: phaseRaw
fields.description: Current completion phase of the portraits (raw ID).

fields.name: previewEmotion
fields.description: A single portrait. Return the 'Normal' portrait if avalaible, but may return another one if not present.

fields.name: recolorSheetUrl
fields.description: URL to a SpriteBot format recolor sheet.

fields.name: required
fields.description: Whether or not this form should have portraits.

fields.name: sheetUrl
fields.description: URL to a SpriteBot format sheet of all portraits.

fields.name: action
fields.description: A single sprite for a given action.

fields.name: actions
fields.description: A list of all existing sprites for the actions.

fields.name: animDataXml
fields.description: URL to the AnimData XML file for this sprite set.

fields.name: bounty
fields.description: Guild Point bounty for this sprite set.

fields.name: creditPrimary
fields.description: Primary artist credits.

fields.name: creditSecondary
fields.description: All other artists credited.

fields.name: modifiedDate
fields.description: The date and time this sprite set was last updated.

fields.name: phase
fields.description: Current completion phase of the sprites.

fields.name: phaseRaw
fields.description: Current completion phase of the sprites (raw ID).

fields.name: recolorSheetUrl
fields.description: URL to a SpriteBot format recolor sheet.

fields.name: required
fields.description: Whether or not this form should have sprites.

fields.name: zipUrl
fields.description: URL to a SpriteBot format ZIP archive of all sprites.

types.name: OtherBounty
types.description: A bounty for a non-standard phase.

types.name: Phase
types.description: The current phase of the sprite or portrait.

enumValues.name: UNKNOWN
enumValues.description: Returned if the phase value is non-standard. Use phaseRaw to get the raw ID.

types.name: Portrait
types.description: A single portrait for a single emotion.

fields.name: emotion
fields.description: Name of the emotion.

fields.name: locked
fields.description: Whether or not this sprite is locked and requires special permissions to be updated.

fields.name: url
fields.description: URL to the portraits.

fields.name: apiVersion
fields.description: Version of this API.

fields.name: config
fields.description: Configuration for this instance of SpriteCollab.

fields.name: credit
fields.description: Retrieve a list of credits.

fields.name: meta
fields.description: Meta information about the server and state of the assets.

fields.name: monster
fields.description: Retrieve a list of monsters.

args.name: filter
args.description: Monster IDs to limit the request to.

fields.name: searchCredit
fields.description: Search for a credit entry by (parts) of the ID, the author name or the contact info. Results are sorted by best match.

fields.name: searchMonster
fields.description: Search for a monster by (parts) of its name. Results are sorted by best match.

types.name: Sprite
types.description: A single sprite for a single action.

fields.name: action
fields.description: Action of this sprite.

fields.name: animUrl
fields.description: URL to the sprite sheet containing the actual frames for the animation.

fields.name: locked
fields.description: Whether or not this sprite is locked and requires special permissions to be updated.

fields.name: offsetsUrl
fields.description: URL to the sprite sheet containing the sprite offset pixels for each frame.

fields.name: shadowsUrl
fields.description: URL to the sprite sheet containing the shadow placeholders for each frame.

types.name: SpriteUnion
types.description:
A single sprite for a single action that is either a copy of another sprite (as
defined in the AnimData.xml) or has it's own sprite data.

types.name: String
types.description: The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

types.name: __Directive
types.description:
A Directive provides a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document.

In some cases, you need to provide options to alter GraphQL's execution behavior in ways field arguments will not suffice, such as conditionally including or skipping a field. Directives provide this by describing additional information to the executor.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a query operation.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a mutation operation.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a subscription operation.

enumValues.name: FIELD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment definition.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment spread.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an inline fragment.

enumValues.name: VARIABLE_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a variable definition.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a schema definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a scalar definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an object type definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an argument definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an interface definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a union definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM_VALUE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum value definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object type definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object field definition.

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: One possible value for a given Enum. Enum values are unique values, not a placeholder for a string or numeric value. However an Enum value is returned in a JSON response as a string.

types.name: __Field
types.description: Object and Interface types are described by a list of Fields, each of which has a name, potentially a list of arguments, and a return type.

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: Arguments provided to Fields or Directives and the input fields of an InputObject are represented as Input Values which describe their type and optionally a default value.

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: A GraphQL-formatted string representing the default value for this input value.

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Schema defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, as well as the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: A list of all directives supported by this server.

types.name: __Type
types.description:
The fundamental unit of any GraphQL Schema is the type. There are many kinds of types in GraphQL as represented by the `__TypeKind` enum.

Depending on the kind of a type, certain fields describe information about that type. Scalar types provide no information beyond a name, description and optional `specifiedByUrl`, while Enum types provide their values. Object and Interface types provide the fields they describe. Abstract types, Union and Interface, provide the Object types possible at runtime. List and NonNull types compose other types.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given `__Type` is.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields`, `interfaces`, and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

directives.name: deprecated
directives.description: Marks an element of a GraphQL schema as no longer supported.

args.name: reason
args.description: Explains why this element was deprecated, usually also including a suggestion for how to access supported similar data. Formatted using the Markdown syntax, as specified by [CommonMark](https://commonmark.org/).

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true.

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if` argument is true.

directives.name: specifiedBy
directives.description: Exposes a URL that specifies the behaviour of this scalar.

args.name: url
args.description: The URL that specifies the behaviour of this scalar.
